segments.text: Hey ! That food was terrific . I can't eat another bite . Are you sure you don't want another dish ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm full . My stomach isn't growling at me any more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know what you mean . I'm so full that I can burst . Shall we go then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm all set . Thank you for the dinner , Jack .
segments.speaker: S2
